title: Ep 109: Back to the Library with Borough Home founder Laura Lutz
itunes:title: Ep 109: Back to the Library with Borough Home founder Laura Lutz
itunes:subtitle: A candle club for everyone, the Libby app, and a way to listen to books while supporting indie bookstores.
description:
#Candleshoes, listen up! Borough Home founder and candle maker (and OG geezer!) Laura Lutz is here to teach Caroline how to read (yes, really). Borough Home started in July 2021, and they are fully Gee Thanks! endorsed. If you’re looking for a glam, luxe candle for under $30, it’s Borough Home. If you’re looking to gift yourself something glam and under $30 every month, join Caroline as a member of the monthly edit candle club! 


PRODUCTS MENTIONED: 


Borough Home: https://shopboroughhome.com/ 

Borough Home Candle Club: https://shopboroughhome.com/collections/monthly-edit  


Check out e-books from the library with the Libby App: https://www.overdrive.com/apps/libby/ 


Support your fav indie bookstore AND listen to audiobooks with the Libro.FM app (switch over from Audible!): https://tidd.ly/3kA6Pbx 


Gee Thanks! is powered by subscribers like you! To keep all of our Gee Thanks! content free and accessible to all, consider making a monthly donation of $2 to keep us going. 


Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod and shop all of our recs here: www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 


As always, reach me at Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com, @geethanksjustboughtitpod on Instagram, or leave me a message at 424-245-0736. 



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
